title: I am having troubles opening League
body:
So after not playing League for a week I have an urge to play it again but instead of the other times where it'd open normally it's opening the logo for a second and then poofs out of existence, I have tried searching for solutions including a previous board with the same struggle as me and after trying everything in that place nothing worked. tried forcing the patcher to repair itself that didn't work, tried running as administrator that didn't work. I am running very low on options and I think I should post this issue. So does anyone know how I can possibly fix this?

Update: So I did nothing and league opened, idk how this problem got fixed, if there was a problem to begin with, I find it weird it would take an hour to open up league but I honestly don't know. I am seeing other recent posts at the time of the update with the same issue, but seeing as idk how to fix it. What I do know is that I apparently have -1 min ETA so I might have more issues I didn't know about. If I do have more issues that are radically different from this original issue I will likely make a post of it if I cannot solve the issue within an hour.

replies.body: Those problems where you see the League Logo and then it just disappears without opening mean that it wasn't able to access the game files properly in order to open. Should be easy enough to fix up by adjusting your permissions by following the steps in our [**permissions guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204134104-Setting-up-your-Permissions). Give that a go and try launching it again to fix that weird -1 min thing too!
Thanks for the help, it works out now so now I can chill in the rift again. I appreciate you taking your time to respond to this thread.
